description: The Sorosis Club Scholarship was established in 1994 to be awarded to a College of Liberal Arts undergraduate or graduate student of admirable character. Eligibility Requirements Liberal Arts major Full-time student Minimum GPA 3.0 Letters of recommendation from at least two professors A student of admirable character Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Liberal Arts   or SIS_College_2 is Liberal Arts
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Liberal Arts   or SIS_College_2 is Liberal Arts

criteria.description: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
